The U.S. and other countries around the globe have essentially been brought into tyranny in just several short weeks and there is currently no end in sight to the lockdowns just as I warned 90-days ago when I said that the #lockdowns will keep being extended and “will never lift.” #Event201 #GlobalHealthSecurityAgenda #MedicalMartialLaw
